AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya: defendant charged with conspiracy and assorted offenses related to an illegal alien smuggling venture, found guilty on all counts, sentenced to 292 months in prison, seeking relief from his sentence under Section 2255, and arguing for relief due to sentencing error, alleging ineffective assistance of counsel
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Adrian Almaguer: affidavit provider and defense counsel for Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya, whose performance is being challenged by Ibarra-Zelaya for alleged ineffectiveness during sentencing
